snippet.title: Smack Studio (Early Access) Release Trailer - sandbox fighting game with bulit-in animation tools!
snippet.description:
Download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1739300/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=description
Visit our website: https://smackstudio.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=description
Join our Discord: https://smackstudio.com/discord

Smack Studio Early Access is out now! We're so excited to share it with you.

Smack Studio is a platform fighting game with powerful built-in animation tools. You're able to animate 3D fighters from 2D sprites - you can upload your own sprites, map them to a fighter's skeleton with our tool, and export your creations. 

PAX West 2021 was a blast. It was so good to meet everyone and see the creations you came up with in such a short time. We can't wait to see what you do next now that the tool is available for you to use at home.

Music provided by Argofox
"Zentra - Siege"
https://soundcloud.com/argofox/zentra-siege

"Animated Pixel Adventurer" by rvros
https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
